## SDQ vs CBS

SDQ vs CBS: Streamlining Questionnaire Comparison Comparing the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) with the Child Behaviour Scale (CBS) can be a complex task, given the varying questions and criteria used in these questionnaires. Psychologists and social scientists often struggle with this harmonisation process. Thatâ€™s where Harmony comes in, a software developed especially for psychologists, designed to simplify and automate the comparison process. Using AI and natural language processing, Harmony gives a percentage match between each item in SDQ and CBS in the 'SDQ vs CBS' comparison. Thanks to Harmony, you don't have to manually trawl through long PDFs and transfer information into Excel, a process considered mundane and time-consuming. To utilize Harmony for 'SDQ vs CBS' comparisons, you can select the instruments from Harmony's existing database, or upload your own instruments as PDFs for a personalised experience. Harmony's advanced language models enable comparisons in various languages. For psychologists interested in assessing changing social conditions or testing repeatability of longitudinal analyses across studies, Harmony is an indispensable tool. Try the 'SDQ vs CBS' comparison with Harmony! This software is designed to take the effort out of harmonisation and makes it easy to assess comparability and make connections across different behavioural studies involving 2-17-year-olds. Remember, you can utilize Harmony's web interface to drag in your custom instrumentation. Compare your SDQ and CBS questionnaires today and experience the ease of psychology research with Harmony.

## Compare the items in SDQ and CBS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and CBS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just CBS into Harmony</a> - compare CBS with other instruments
